mapper.select: select product.*,supplier.* from product ,supplier where product.SupplierID=supplier.SupplierID order by cast(supplier.supplierid as signed),cast(substring_INDex(product.ProductID,'_',-1) as signed)

select product.*,supplier.* from product ,supplier where product.SupplierID=supplier.SupplierID AND (product.productname like #{name} or supplier.suppliername like #{name}) order by cast(supplier.supplierid as signed),cast(substring_INDex(product.ProductID,'_',-1) as signed)
select product.*,supplier.* from product ,supplier where product.SupplierID=supplier.SupplierID AND (supplier.SupplierID=#{supplierIdOrName} or supplier.suppliername=#{supplierIdOrName})
select product.*,supplier.* from product ,supplier where product.SupplierID=supplier.SupplierID and (product.Quantity < product.MinSafeStock)

SELECT a.*,d.* FROM product a,supplier d WHERE a.SupplierID=d.SupplierID AND EXISTS ( SELECT 'X' FROM deliverydetail b, deliverymaster c WHERE c.DeliveryID = b.DeliveryID AND CAST(c.DeliveryDate AS SIGNED) > CAST( DATE_FORMAT( date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL 14 DAY), '%Y%m%d' ) AS SIGNED ) AND b.productid = a.productid ) and (a.quantity < a.MinSafeStock)
